ref: 711 alāˊbu -- , ˚ū -- f. ʻ bottle -- gourd ʼ Suśr., m.n. ʻ vessel made of it ʼ AV., n. ʻ its fruit ʼ MBh., ālābu -- f. lex. 2. lābū˘ -- f. ʻ gourd ʼ lex., lābukī -- f. ʻ a kind of lute ʼ lex., lāˊpu -- m.n. ʻ a partic. instrument ʼ MaitrS. 3. lambā -- f. ʻ a bitter gourd ʼ Suśr.
